title: Comment: Google has no excuses left for limiting the Pixel 6 to just three Android updates
content:
The Pixel 6 ushers in a new era for Google with a new chip under the hood that enables focused performance, specialized software, and longer updates. However, Google’s promise has already been dwarfed by the Galaxy S22, and Samsung isn’t even using special chips there. Google has no excuses left for limiting the Pixel 6 to only three major Android updates.

more…

The post Comment: Google has no excuses left for limiting the Pixel 6 to just three Android updates appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The moment Samsung officially expanded its update policy to deliver four major Android updates, Google's Pixel 6 policy stopped being enough.
